title: Belgium Private Debt to GDP
description: Private Debt to GDP in Belgium decreased to 257.20 percent in 2021 from 267.90 percent in 2020. Private Debt to GDP in Belgium averaged 219.74 percent from 1995 until 2021, reaching an all time high of 272.80 percent in 2016 and a record low of 151.50 percent in 1995. Private sector debt to GDP measures the indebtedness of both sectors, non-financial corporations and households and non-profit institutions serving households, as a percentage of GDP.
author: OECD
